page.title: 01NORTH HEMEL HEMPSTEAD
page.content: The area is a combination of{old {town, new town}and{open farmland.}The {old town}includes St. Mary's Church, the old Town Hall, Piccotts End Medieval Murals, Gadebridge Park and House and a number of small businesses and specialist shops. The{new town includes 6 neighbourhoods, each with its own shopping centre, open spaces and parkland:- Gadebridge, Highfield, Grovehill, Adeyfield, Woodhall Farm and Warners End. The facilities of police station, library, Civic Centre, College and hospitals are found in the main centre, whilst the Industrial Estate is 2 km away and includes national high technology companies and smaller industries.{Open farmland}lies to the northwest and although mainly arable includes some pastoral farming. The area is well served by bus, rail and motorway.
